member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_SHARED_RESOURCE_INPUT
member.summary: Contains input data for a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_SHARED_RESOURCE command.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_SHARED_RESOURCE_INPUT.Parameters
member.summary: A structure that contains the command GUID and other data.

summary.para: A value that specifies the type of process.

To specify the Desktop Window Manager (DWM) process, set this member to D3D11_PROCESSIDTYPE_DWM. Otherwise, set this member to D3D11_PROCESSIDTYPE_HANDLE and set the ProcessHandle member to a valid handle.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_SHARED_RESOURCE_INPUT.ProcessHandle
member.summary: A process handle. If the ProcessType member equals D3D11_PROCESSIDTYPE_HANDLE, the ProcessHandle member specifies a handle to a process. Otherwise, the value is ignored.

member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_SHARED_RESOURCE_INPUT.AllowAccess
member.summary: If TRUE, the specified process has access to restricted shared resources.
